name: Surprise the Chicken!
description:
Welcome to my submission for the Yogscast Game Jam 2020!, this was entirely made in 3 days!

Let my To fit the theme of Surprise, I made an "infinite runner"where you need to avoid the obstacles by surprising the chicken! But be careful! surprises are  just around the corner!

SADLY, I DID NOT HAVE TIME TO FINISH! :(My idea is to start working on it once I get enough feedback! :)

Victor was in charge of :

1 Day

  • Design: CORE and features
  • Art: Chicken

2 Day

  • Art: Obstacles
  • Code: Player Movement, Platform generator
  • Level Design
  • Background Music: Made in LMMS

3 Day

  • Code: Rest of the Features, such as UI Scripts, Game Managers, etc.
  • UI
  • SoundEffects

Future:

  • New characters
  • Difficulty curve
  • Tutorial
  • New Enemies and Obstacles
  • Fix Bugs
  • More!

Follow me to know more!

https://twitter.com/victor_rdz_fnz

Hope you like it!
